name: Spooky Witness
description:
You have been murdered by a serial killer bad man, the police have came to investigate the crime, however the murder is ready and waiting, The police will be murdered game ended if they get too close to the murder, you have to push the police in the right direction to discover the body and arrest the murder. You'll have to clear obstacles and see through all of the hidden challenges. He is masking the truth, it is your responsibility to unmask what has really happened 



ps. this is my second game and my first game jam :) pretty happy with it, I'm new to godot so if you have any advice please feel free to share it with me, I'm very bad at coding.
